articles.title: Stadia’s biggest (timed) exclusive won’t be exclusive anymore - The Verge
articles.description: Crayta — one of the biggest exclusive Stadia games — won’t be exclusive to Google’s streaming platform soon. Developer Unit 2 Games has confirmed that the title will be making its way to PC. The game was originally announced as a “First on Stadia” timed exclu…
articles.content:

articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: Sony Xperia 1 III leak shows periscope zoom - The Verge
articles.description: Leaked Xperia 1 III renders suggest that Sony’s next flagship might offer a periscope-style optical zoom, 5G, and a 3.5mm headphone jack.
articles.content:
Adding more zoom power makes a lot of sense on an imaging-centric flagship
Alleged leaked renders of the upcoming flagship show Sony sticking with a minimalist design and tall form factor.
